Name: TextBlock7

ParentElementId.Name: Tell us how to help you

ParentElementName: Tell us how to help you

PropertySetConfig.label: TextBlock7
PropertySetConfig.text: We want to make sure we’re providing you with the most relevant information for your local area and for your circumstances to help you plan and prepare for fire. We use this data to determine how to communicate with our communities and to help us to understand how to provide the right resources to each community. Completion of this form is optional however if you do not provide your details it could limit the provision of important CFA information to you.
